title: Insane Hollywood Stories #1
itunes:title: Insane Hollywood Stories #1
description:
Jeremy has been working in Hollywood for nearly 4 decades and he has the stories to prove it. Like that time he spent 3 nights with Hunter S Thompson to try and get the rights to Fear And Loathing. Or that time he did a ton of mushrooms with Mike Tyson… So many stories, so little time. Special guest Bill Dawes.

Remember, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail at  https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven to be featured during “Rolling Calls with Ari Gold” where Jeremy answers questions from the listeners as Ari Gold. 


IG: https://www.howulivinjpivenpodcastshow
Twitter: https://www.howulivinjpivshow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Bill Dawes' IG: https://www.instagram.com/billdawes

Thank you to this week's sponsors:
Rothy's - Get $20 off your first purchase at https://www.rothys.com/piven
Stamps.com - There’s NO risk. With my promo code, PIVEN, you get a special offer that includes a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale. No long-term commitments or contracts. Just go to https://www.Stamps.com, promo code PIVEN.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
